warriors.contracts

Interface WarriorsAPI


  • public interface WarriorsAPI
    This interface describes the Warriors Game API

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameState createGame(java.lang.String playerName, Hero hero, Map map)
      Called by the client to create a new game.
      java.util.List<Hero> getHeroes()
      Called by the client to retrieve the list of available heroes.
      java.util.List<Map> getMaps()
      Called by the client to retrieve the list of available maps.
      GameState nextTurn(java.lang.String gameID)
      Called by the client to execute a new turn in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeroes

        java.util.List<Hero> getHeroes()
        Called by the client to retrieve the list of available heroes.
        Returns:
        the list of available heroes

      • getMaps

        java.util.List<Map> getMaps()
        Called by the client to retrieve the list of available maps.
        Returns:
        the list of available maps

      • createGame

        GameState createGame(java.lang.String playerName,
                     Hero hero,
                     Map map)
        Called by the client to create a new game.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player
        hero - the chosen hero for the game
        map - the chosen map for the game
        Returns:
        the initial game state

      • nextTurn

        GameState nextTurn(java.lang.String gameID)
        Called by the client to execute a new turn in the game. The game engine has to return the new game state.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the ID of the game
        Returns:
        the current game state
